title: Drone Store
description: A single-page drones-product-based web app with a dashboard and authenticationsystem. Where users can buy drone products and manage their orders and review our products.Admin can manage products and manage all orders. Admin approved orders Then users purchase a product.

title: Travenu Tourism Website
description: A single-page tourism-based web app with a simple dashboard and authentication system. Where people can book the tour service that we provide. People can manage their booking orders.

title: Female Care
description: A simple dynamic healthcare website with a login system. Where females can make an appointment Gynecology doctors prescribe to the patients.
